      • getLocalBlob

        protected com.zimbra.cs.store.Blob getLocalBlob​(com.zimbra.cs.mailbox.Mailbox mbox,
                                                java.lang.String locator,
                                                boolean fromCache)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a local instance of a blob, pulling from the retore store if necessary Overriding to add in tracking for remote fetches since readStreamFromStore only measures the time to get the InputStream
        Overrides:
        getLocalBlob in class com.zimbra.cs.store.external.ExternalStoreManager
        Parameters:
        mbox - The mailbox containing the blob
        locator - The stored locator for a mailbox blob object
        fromCache - Whether to retrieve cached object if available
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the store from the backing store
